all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And by thy word many high ones shall be brought low, and by thy word many low ones shall be exalted.
Doctrine and Covenants 112:8
Quote of the Day
"The Father and the Son appeared to the boy Joseph Smith, thus initiating the Restoration of the gospel of Jesus Christ in the latter days."
Elder David A. Bednar | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
